metadata.name: GenesisBull#0002
metadata.description: Mr. Meng Changming's NFT "Genesis Bulls" is a masterpiece based on classical Chinese calligraphic lines combined with some elements from African wood carving and Dunhuang murals, which brings about a new aesthetic outlook of his NFT works so as to integrate such cultural concepts as "original" and "organic" into a space tunnel between the post modern world and Metaverse. Mr. Meng Changming has been dedicated himself to painting over half a century and has held more than 100 solo exhibitions throughout the globe. In addition, he has more than twenty books books published on art and various other subjects .
